website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few complaints that are commonly found with soccer balls, this one earns points for its excellent craftsmanship and good looks that make it a close contender for the best.
pros: Garners praise for the sturdy material that feels like leather
Comes in various designs that replicate Madrid soccer balls
cons: Ships deflated and is a bit difficult to inflate
A few consumers were disappointed to find faulty valves upon arrival
On the high end of the price range

customer_reviews.title: Be careful removing sticker
customer_reviews.text: If you purchase this ball, be careful removing the small sticker that is adhered to the ball. The sticker has a small QR code on it and was partially permanently stuck to the ball covering. It will tear off the very thin layer of vinyl material on the ball if you try and remove it. It doesn’t appear to serve any purpose and provides no beneficial information, so our son wanted it removed. This ball covering is extremely thin and I question the durability over any period of time based on how easily it peeled off with the sticker.
customer_reviews.author: James Endrizzi

customer_reviews.title: Simply leaks air too fast to use
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this ball. It arrived with air in a box, which seems unusual these days for a mail-order soccer ball. It is super soft and supple. Unfortunately, air leaks out fast - like it would have to be pumped every 20 minutes to retain enough air to be usable. I thought I had finally found the perfect ball, but it's another miss for me.
customer_reviews.author: GoatBeard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ball, solid quality
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this ball. It was delivered timely even as a pre-order which was awesome. Excellent quality, fast shipping & it seems to be holding up very well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Julie P

customer_reviews.title: Manchester United fan must-have!  Great ball.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Replace a ball like this every month or two. Probably my son’s 4th ball like this one. Quality is great, he just never stops kicking the ball. And he won’t leave the house without it. Lent one to a friend and still uses it when he visits them. Our whole soccer team loves to use it. Awesome ball for a Man U fan.
customer_reviews.author: Danny M. Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Got my money's worth!
customer_reviews.text: What a great ball. We purchased this for a child for Christmas and won't get to see how it does long term, but the feel and texture of the ball was great.
customer_reviews.author: JShirley

customer_reviews.title: Quality full size soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: Great price ($17) for Christmas gift - 17 year old soccer player nephew. He loves Manchester United and the ball is quality.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking ball
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 13-year-old son. He loves it and gets compliments often.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother. He likes it, nice minimalist design and great material.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Looked great, but busted a seam in less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! Daughter uses it a lot and it is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: AvgConsumer

customer_reviews.title: good if you just want a ball that rolls
customer_reviews.text: I'm a united fan and pretty happy about the ball, but like if you want something that you can use in games and stuff, don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: was happy about it but it dis not want to inflate it must have a hole somewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: we bought this soccer ball for a birthday present, it cannot inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase and I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this ball for my hubby and we are both soccer players and MANU fans so this particular ball was a must! Good quality and a great looking ball!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fan Product
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of Manchester United for years. Authentic Adidas product and of high quality. Really love it. Shows the support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement  ball please..
customer_reviews.text: When I blew the ball up it had a small chip out of the fabric. Can I get a different one please.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

product_meta.title: adidas Performance Manchester United FC Soccer Ball, Black/White, 5
product_meta.description: Like the team that wore it, the '90-'92 Man United away uniform is celebrated, hated and impossible to ignore. This soccer ball features a refresh of the uniform's Aztec-style graphics. Machine stitched for an elite first touch, the ball is finished with a team crest and adidas Badge of Sport.
feature_bullets: Special TPU exterior material is designed to resist abrasion and last longer

Size 3 ball suggested for ages 8 and under; size 4 ball suggested for ages 8-12; size 5 ball (official size) suggested for ages 12+. Size 1 is a mini ball. Check with your local league for size requirements.
Butyl bladder for best air retention to keep the ball's shape and stay inflated longer
Size 1 is a mini ball. Check with your local league for size requirements.
Ball ships deflated. Inflation is required. Pump not included.
